page.title: 12HALESFIELD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: INDUSTRY_Due to the overcrowding in the west Midlands Telford New Town was built to acommodate some of the population some fifteen years ago.At this time it was also necessary to build industrial estates to provide employment for the new housing estates.A high proportion of the factories are in the engineering field, other categories include plastics,electrical/electronic factories,building trade supplies and constructions. EMPLOYMENT_Most of the employees on Halesfield come from the housing estates built locally. TRANSPORT_The firms that moved over from the Midlands had difficulty with travel between established customers, suppliers and in some cases parent firms.Many of these problems have now been solved with the M54 motorway link
